mapper.select: SELECT b.boardPostNo, m.memNickname, b.memId, b.title, b.createdDate, b.boardCtgId, c.boardCtgName FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.memId = m.memId JOIN boardCtg c ON b.boardCtgId = c.boardCtgId WHERE b.boardCtgId = #{boardCtgId} ORDER BY b.createdDate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT b.boardPostNo, m.memNickname, b.memId, b.title, b.createdDate, b.boardCtgId, c.boardCtgName, b.uploadFile, b.price FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.memId = m.memId JOIN boardCtg c ON b.boardCtgId = c.boardCtgId WHERE b.boardCtgId = #{boardCtgId} ORDER BY b.createdDate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE boardCtgId = #{boardCtgId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (memId, boardCtgId, title, content, uploadFile, price) VALUES (#{memId}, #{boardCtgId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{uploadFile}, #{price})
